greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Signed version of A090678 and congruent to A088567 mod 2.
comment: a(n) = (-1)^[n/2]*A090678(n) = A088567(n) mod 2, where A088567(n) equals the number of "non-squashing" partitions of n. a(n) = -A110036(n)/2 for n>=2, where the A110036 gives the partial quotients of the continued fraction expansion of 1 + Sum_{n>=0} 1/x^(2^n).
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Jul 09 2005
